ygData.subject: Re: General Question about getting items into invento ry.
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok well i dont think ill change my way of doing it.. because you have to target the bag.. if u miss.. oops. you drop it and no message.. Here what i do..Any i
ygData.messageBody:
Ok well i dont think ill change my way of doing it.. because you have to target the
bag.. if u miss.. oops. you drop it and no message..

Here what i do..Any i have several thing i summon when i get on.
You can summon a water, food,bandages,weapon, Persona , Drop.
repeat.. It wont look like you have the other items but you do.

the advantages to this is while one spell resets you cast another.


Good luck
Akdov - veeshan

>

> Vayne, Troll Shaman wallowing in hatred for himself for not figuring that

> -->water. --> --> >>You can make an inventory spot a hot button. So put
> -->that slot as a hot --> >>button, and just drop it there.
> --> >>Sonoroud, Dark Elf Nercomancer --> -->I also favor the approach of
